dependencies.name: nlopt
dependencies.description:
NLopt is a free/open-source library for nonlinear optimization,
providing a common interface for a number of different free optimization
routines available online as well as original implementations of various
other algorithms.

dependencies.name: py-asdf
dependencies.description:
The Advanced Scientific Data Format (ASDF) is a next-generation
interchange format for scientific data. This package contains the Python
implementation of the ASDF Standard.

dependencies.name: py-colored
dependencies.description:
Simple library for color and formatting to terminal Very simple Python
library for color and formatting in terminal. Collection of color codes
and names for 256 color terminal setups. The following is a list of 256
colors for Xterm, containing an example of the displayed color, Xterm
Name, Xterm Number and HEX.

Python @deprecated decorator to deprecate old python classes, functions

items.

Fast numerical derivatives for analytic functions with arbitrary round-

dependencies.description:
Solves automatic numerical differentiation problems in one or more
variables.

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-ordered-set
dependencies.description:
An OrderedSet is a mutable data structure that is a hybrid of a list and
a set. It remembers the order of its entries, and every entry has an
index number that can be looked up.

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.description: PyYAML is a YAML parser and emitter for Python.

A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,

This is a setuptools_scm plugin that adds support for git archives (for
example the ones GitHub automatically generates).

dependencies.name: py-tabulate

dependencies.name: py-tensorflow
dependencies.description: TensorFlow is an open source machine learning framework for everyone.

dependencies.name: py-tensorflow-probability
dependencies.description:
TensorFlow Probability (TFP) is a Python library built on TensorFlow
that makes it easy to combine probabilistic models and deep learning on
modern hardware (TPU, GPU). It's for data scientists, statisticians, ML
researchers, and practitioners who want to encode domain knowledge to
understand data and make predictions.

dependencies.name: py-texttable
dependencies.description: Python module for creating simple ASCII tables.

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: py-uhi
dependencies.description:
Unified Histogram Interface: tools to help library authors work with
histograms

dependencies.name: py-uproot
dependencies.description:
ROOT I/O in pure Python and NumPy. Uproot is a reader and a writer of
the ROOT file format using only Python and Numpy. Unlike the standard
C++ ROOT implementation, Uproot is only an I/O library, primarily
intended to stream data into machine learning libraries in Python.
Unlike PyROOT and root_numpy, Uproot does not depend on C++ ROOT.
Instead, it uses Numpy to cast blocks of data from the ROOT file as
Numpy arrays.
